languages.text: {n}Торговец редкостями, похоже, ни на минуту не прекращал улыбаться с тех самых пор, как вы говорили в последний раз.{/n}
{n}The curiosity merchant's smile has, or so it seems, never left his face even for a minute since you last spoke.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Торговец редкостями, похоже, ни на минуту не прекращал улыбаться с тех самых пор, как вы говорили в последний раз.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The curiosity merchant's smile has, or so it seems, never left his face even for a minute since you last spoke.{/n}
{n}The curiosity merchant's smile has, or so it seems, never left his face even for a minute since you last spoke.{/n}
{n}The curiosity merchant's smile has, or so it seems, never left his face even for a minute since you last spoke.{/n}

{n}The curiosity merchant's smile has, or so it seems, never left his face even for a minute since you last spoke.{/n}
{n}The curiosity merchant's smile has, or so it seems, never left his face even for a minute since you last spoke.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Anscheinend hat der Kuriositätenhändler seit eurem letzten Gespräch ohne auch nur eine Minute Unterbrechung fortwährend weitergelächelt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The curiosity merchant's smile has, or so it seems, never left his face even for a minute since you last spoke.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Anscheinend hat der Kuriositätenhändler seit eurem letzten Gespräch ohne auch nur eine Minute Unterbrechung fortwährend weitergelächelt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Visiblement, le sourire du marchand de curiosités n'a pas quitté son visage depuis que vous lui avez parlé pour la dernière fois.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The curiosity merchant's smile has, or so it seems, never left his face even for a minute since you last spoke.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Visiblement, le sourire du marchand de curiosités n'a pas quitté son visage depuis que vous lui avez parlé pour la dernière fois.{/n}

languages.text: {n}奇珍商人的脸上依然挂着微笑，仿佛自你们上次见面以来，他始终保持着笑容可掬的态度。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The curiosity merchant's smile has, or so it seems, never left his face even for a minute since you last spoke.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}奇珍商人的脸上依然挂着微笑，仿佛自你们上次见面以来，他始终保持着笑容可掬的态度。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La sonrisa del mercader de curiosidades no ha abandonado su rostro ni por un momento desde la última vez que hablasteis, o esa impresión te da.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The curiosity merchant's smile has, or so it seems, never left his face even for a minute since you last spoke.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La sonrisa del mercader de curiosidades no ha abandonado su rostro ni por un momento desde la última vez que hablasteis, o esa impresión te da.{/n}

languages.text: {n}珍品商人の笑みは、あなたが最後に話して以来、一瞬たりともその顔から消えていないように見える。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The curiosity merchant's smile has, or so it seems, never left his face even for a minute since you last spoke.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}珍品商人の笑みは、あなたが最後に話して以来、一瞬たりともその顔から消えていないように見える。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Seninle konuştuğu andan beri antika tüccarının gülümsemesi, bir an bile yüzünden silinmemiş gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The curiosity merchant's smile has, or so it seems, never left his face even for a minute since you last spoke.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Seninle konuştuğu andan beri antika tüccarının gülümsemesi bir an bile yüzünden silinmemiş gibi görünüyor.{/n}
